name: astroz
description: Astrodynamics and Spacecraft Toolkit Written in Zig! Features orbit prop, celestial precession, CCSDS parsing, RF parsing, fits image parsing, and more!
readme: [![CI][ci-shd]][ci-url] [![CD][cd-shd]][cd-url] [![DC][dc-shd]][dc-url] ## Astronomical and Spacecraft Toolkit Written in Zig **Featuring the fastest open-source SGP4 propagator.** | Orbital Mechanics | Spacecraft Ops | Astronomy | |-------------------|----------------|-----------| | SGP4 propagation | CCSDS packets | FITS parsing | | TLE parsing | VITA49 packets | WCS coordinates | | Orbital maneuvers | Attitude determination | Star precession | | Monte Carlo sims | | Celestial bodies | ### Performance Sub-meter accuracy validated against reference implementations. Uses SIMD (AVX2/SSE) to process 4 satellites simultaneously. #### Single Satellite (Python) | Scenario | astroz | python-sgp4 | Speedup | |----------|--------|-------------|---------| | 1 day (minute res) | 0.24 ms | 0.65 ms | **2.7x** | | 1 week (minute res) | 1.99 ms | 3.41 ms | **1.7x** | | 2 weeks (minute res) | 3.22 ms | 7.00 ms | **2.2x** | | 2 weeks (second res) | 144 ms | 438 ms | **3.0x** | | 1 month (minute res) | 5.29 ms | 14.84 ms | **2.8x** | #### Multi-Satellite Constellation | Satellites | Time Points | Total Props | Throughput | |------------|-------------|-------------|------------| | 100 | 10,080 | 1M | **7.9M props/sec** | | 13,000+ | 120 | 1.5M | **6M+ props/sec** | The [Cesium visualization example](examples/README.md) propagates the entire active satellite catalog (~13,000 satellites) at interactive rates. **[Try the live demo →](https://attron.github.io/astroz-demo/)** ### Python ```bash pip install astroz ``` ```python from astroz import Tle, Sgp4, Sgp4Constellation import numpy as np tle = Tle("1 25544U 98067A 24127.82853009 ...\n2 25544 51.6393 ...") sgp4 = Sgp4(tle) # Single propagation pos, vel = sgp4.propagate(30.0) # 30 min after epoch # Batch propagation (zero-copy into pre-allocated arrays) times = np.arange(1209600, dtype=np.float64) / 60.0 # 2 weeks in minutes positions = np.empty((len(times), 3), dtype=np.float64) velocities = np.empty((len(times), 3), dtype=np.float64) sgp4.propagate_into(times, positions, velocities) # Multi-satellite constellation (SIMD-accelerated) tles = [Tle(tle_str) for tle_str in tle_strings] constellation = Sgp4Constellation(tles) times = np.arange(1440, dtype=np.float64) # 1 day in minutes out = np.empty((len(times) * constellation.num_batches * 4 * 6,), dtype=np.float64) constellation.propagate_into(times, out) # ~6M propagations/sec ``` ### Usage - Add `astroz` as a dependency in your `build.zig.zon`. ```sh zig fetch --save https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/archive/.tar.gz #or zig fetch --save git+https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/#HEAD ``` - Use `astroz` as a module in your `build.zig`. ```zig const astroz_dep = b.dependency("astroz", .{ .target = target, .optimize = optimize, }); const astroz_mod = astroz_dep.module("astroz"); exe.root_module.addImport("astroz", astroz_mod); ``` ### Examples #### Orbital Mechanics - #### [Planet Transfer & Mission Planning](examples/transfer_propagation.zig) Demonstrates interplanetary transfers with mission planning (Hohmann vs Bi-Elliptic comparison) and trajectory propagation. - #### [Orbit Maneuvers](examples/orbit_maneuvers.zig) Comprehensive example showing TLE-based orbit propagation with various maneuver types: impulse, plane change, and phase change. - #### [Monte Carlo Simulation](examples/simple_monte_carlo.zig) Statistical analysis for mission planning with uncertainty. - #### [SGP4 Propagation](examples/sgp4_propagation.zig) Analytical orbit propagation using SGP4 with TLE input. Demonstrates both direct SGP4 usage and the modular propagator interface. - #### [Cesium Satellite Visualization](examples/README.md) — **[Live Demo](https://attron.github.io/astroz-demo/)** Interactive 3D visualization of the entire near-earth satellite catalog (~13,000 satellites) using Cesium. Features real-time SGP4 propagation at ~6M props/sec, constellation filtering, search, and satellite tracking. #### Spacecraft Operations - #### [Orbit Orientation Determination](examples/simple_spacecraft_orientation.zig) Calculate spacecraft attitude and orientation. #### Telemetry & Data Handling - #### [Parse Vita49](examples/parse_vita49.zig) / [with Callback](examples/parse_vita49_callback.zig) VITA Radio Transport (VRT) packet stream parsing. - #### [Parse CCSDS](examples/parse_ccsds.zig) / [with File Sync](examples/parse_ccsds_file_sync.zig) Parse CCSDS space packet protocol from files. - #### [Create CCSDS Packet](examples/create_ccsds_packet.zig) / [with Config](examples/create_ccsds_packet_config.zig) Generate CCSDS packets for telemetry. #### Astronomy & Astrometry - #### [Generate Image from FITS File](examples/parse_fits_file.zig) Parse and render FITS astronomical image data. - #### [Precess Star Coordinates](examples/precess_star.zig) Calculate stellar precession to a target epoch. - #### [Calculate WCS from TLE](examples/wcs.zig) Compute World Coordinate System values from orbital elements. [ci-shd]: https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/ATTron/astroz/ci.yaml?branch=main&logo=github&label=CI&labelColor=black [ci-url]: https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/blob/main/.github/workflows/ci.yaml [cd-shd]: https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/ATTron/astroz/cd.yaml?branch=main&logo=github&label=CD&labelColor=black [cd-url]: https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/blob/main/.github/workflows/cd.yaml [dc-shd]: https://img.shields.io/badge/click-F6A516?logo=zig&logoColor=F6A516&label=doc&labelColor=black [dc-url]: https://attron.github.io/astroz

releases.name: v0.4.2
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* SIMD SGP4 omptimizations

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/compare/v0.4.1...v0.4.2

releases.name: v0.4.1
releases.body: * small fix to the github action with the proper zig build flags

releases.name: v0.4.0
releases.body:
## Biggest Change
* Add SGP4 prop and offer C API / python bindings into it
   * This implementation is the fastest open source option for SGP4 orbit prop
## What's Changed
* PD-51: LSK kernel parsing by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/35
* PD-16: fix file readers by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/36
* fix tcp timing bugs introduced by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/38
* fix issues with new Io package by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/40
* clean up some formatting by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/39
* io changes by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/41
* bump zignal to fix breaking FITS tests by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/42
* make things a little less choatic by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/43
* clean up imports by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/44
* spg4 prop by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/45
* refactor how orbit prop is designed by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/46
* maneuver updates by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/47
* C API + Python Bindings by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/48
* package python bindings Part 1 by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/49
* spg4 with python and benchmarks by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/50


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

releases.name: v0.3.0
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* move calculations from spacecraft into calculations by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/28
* add option to disable llvm when building by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/30
* add orbital mechanics by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/29
* feat(fits): enable image parsing and example by @arrufat in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/31
* monte carlo simulations by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/32
* feature/pm-45: update fits to work w MEF and clean up some of the logging by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/33
* **PD-59: release of zig 0.15.x by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/34**

## New Contributors
* @arrufat made their first contribution in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/31

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

releases.name: v0.2.0
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* update to zig v0.14
* fix realloc errors introduced on zig master by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/26
* Convert most variables to camelCase by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/27


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

releases.name: v0.1.0
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* feat: [sc-56] Astroz: Make a functional library by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/1
* chore: [sc-57] Astroz: setup CI by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/2
* feat: [sc-55] Astroz: create constants for the known forces by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/3
* chore: [sc-64] Update Zig Workflow to Call `zig build test --summary all` by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/5
* feat: [sc-61] Astroz: Astronomical Calculations by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/4
* feat: [sc-68] Astroz: add planetary constants by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/6
* chore: [sc-71] Astroz: Usage in Readme by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/7
* start vita49 parsing by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/8
* setup and test parsers by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/9
* Parse from file functionality by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/10
* Pass in sync pattern to better parse when gaps are in stream / files by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/11
* add tle support by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/12
* Orbit Prop by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/13
* add impulse maneuvers by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/14
* phase orbit changes by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/15
* phase change implementation by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/16
* refactor:  make project more Zig-idiomatic by @tensorush in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/17
* feat: add example suite by @tensorush in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/18
* fix: typos by @tensorush in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/19
* spacecraft orientation determination by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/21
* refactor: use file structs by @tensorush in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/22
* fits file support, single image by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/20
* adding multi hdu support for fits by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/23
* Feature/ans 39 by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/24
* Feature/ans 39 by @ATTron in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/25

## New Contributors
* @ATTron made their first contribution in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/1
* @tensorush made their first contribution in https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/pull/17

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ATTron/astroz/commits/v0.1.0

owner_bio: Helping move data between spacecraft and earth
